data.x: There was a guy named Joel
data.y: Not too different from you or me
Just another face in a red jumpsuit

data.x: He did a good job cleaning up the place
data.y: But his bosses didn't like him so they shot him into space

data.x: He'll have to sit and watch them all

data.y: Joel can't control where the movies begin or end

data.x: Because he used those special parts
If you're wondering how he eats and breathes
Then repeat to yourself: It's just a show
data.y: I should really just relax -- for Mystery Science Theater 3000
